attributes.action: Free Healthcare for pets/animals (PHS - Pet Health Service)
attributes.additional_details: It’s a horrible thing that everyone will experience at least once in their life, putting down a pet because they can’t afford the bills, so please share this make PHS a thing !!
attributes.background: Vets are so expensive and the amount of pets that get put down because owners can’t afford the operations etc I think that paying extra taxes each month could bring the cost down so pets can have longer life’s !!
